name: Dungeon Heroes (itch)
description:
Dungeon Heroes is my first bigger project. The development and design of it was 8 weeks long. You control a hero and you have to destroy all the monsters. You can switch your class with his attributes. Every class have 2 unique skills, and you can learn one after you defeat the boss, or if you get skill point as quest reward.

Instructions

Mouse to move, Q,W,E,R to use a skill. You can cast only one skill in one time.
